name: Seasonmancer
description:
When time is in near end, only a seasonmancer is said to be able to restore things to balance. A being that can control the Earth's season and use this power in order to solve the problems that come.

Art - Gya, Trunhan

Sound Effects - Fenekito

Music - Fenekito

Voices - Dogoso

Features samples from HALLEY LABS RESOURCE CENTER

A game for Game Jaaj 6
